pageContext.claim: “We have already started talking with the president about taking down the trade barriers -- very substantial barriers to the United States trading with Nigeria.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. goods and services trade with Nigeria totaled an estimated $9 billion in 2016. Exports were $4.4 billion; imports were $4.6 billion. The U.S. goods and services trade deficit with Nigeria was just $216 million in 2016.
